posts.post_title: FS: T206 Mordecai Brown Chicago SGC 50
posts.post_content:
Dead on centered, big full borders, no creases or wrinkles. Very nice card. $260 shipped/insured. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns. Thanks for looking.
